group_1.textLeft: Uh... Inui, was it?
I've got some urgent business with that guy@who just left...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:5050_swing_01_sh]...

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Yikes! Watch it!

group_1.textRight: Grah!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you shouldn't get violent with people@you've just met...
Actually, it's just as bad even if it's@someone you already know!

group_1.textRight: I knew it. You're after Sho, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Sho? Oh, that's his nickname?
Oh, right! I need to catch up to him!
Like I said earlier, that guy's a bad guy.
I came here to kill him!
See? His name is right here, on my list.
I mean, this is his real name right here.

group_1.textRight: Shut up! Everyone is lying!
What do you even know about Sho?!
Why does everyone keep saying that he's@bad?!
How would you know, anyway?!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yikes! Calm down, Inui! It's okay!
I made sure to check that I had the right@person on my list.
His name isn't Sho on here, but I'm sure@I've got his real name.
It's no mistake. All right?

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about?!
Who cares about your stupid list?!
Who cares if he's on it?!
That list is a load of crap!
Someone who's got something against him@must've written it!
Why do you believe it?! It has to be a lie!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, come on... My list isn't wrong.
Well, how about this?
Let's just say he's a bad guy for now.
If, by some slim chance, I'm wrong, I swear@I'll make it up to you.
Okay?

group_1.textRight: What the hell are you talking about?
You're here to kill him, aren't you?
You're here to kill Sho.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! Yeah, I am. That's what I've been@saying.
I'm here to kill him...
(Wow, this is inconvenient...)
(Could she be the type who won't listen to@you no matter what you say?)

group_1.textRight: Just like Kyubey said, you're insane.
Something's wrong with you.
There are plenty of people who are worse@than Sho!
Why don't you go and kill them?! Are you@stupid or something?!
Go and kill the terrible people who are@worse!!!

group_1.textLeft: Th-they're on my list, too.
My list is updated all the time. You don't @need to worry about that.
Check it out. I always double and triple @check and everything.
I guess sometimes I'm a little late...
B-but I try to get the job done as quickly@as I'm able...
I'm doing my best, okay?
So I'm telling you, it's fine!
I swear, it'll be all right!
Oh, wait. I get it.
If I killed the guy, would that be an@inconvenience for you?
Like, you'd have to deal with paperwork and@the government or something?
But you aren't his family, or spouse, or@guardian, right?
So I don't think you'll have to do that...
It's probably less of a hassle than you@think.
Y'know?
Oh!
Does he owe you money?
Like enough that I couldn't buy you a juice@later to make it up to you?

group_1.textRight: Enough!
I'm going to stop you!
I will never, ever forgive you!

group_1.textLeft: (Oh noooooo, she's really mad...)
(She's totally furious with me...)
(Why do I make people mad at me all the@time?)
(I probably have to fight her now, huh...)
(This isn't what I wanted...)

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:5050_swing_01_sh]DIE!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Whoa!
